Text: Uh basically they wait for you to press a key or give a voice command

Speaker: B
Text: Uh the materials we're gonna need to look at uh the two big ones are the integrated circuit chip and the battery

Speaker: B
Text: and the in integrated circuit chip uh works in conjunction with a a diode transistor or resonator comm uh two more resistors and a capacitor

Speaker: B
Text: and the battery works in conjunction with a resistor and a capacitor . Um .

Speaker: B
Text: Uh basically what happens is you'll press a number or give a voice command

Speaker: B
Text: and this creates a a connection within the the remote

Speaker: B
Text: the chip then senses this connection

Speaker: B
Text: and produces a signal in a Morse code format .

Speaker: B
Text: This signal's sent to the transistor

Speaker: B
Text: and then sends it on to the light emitting diode

Speaker: B

Speaker: B

Speaker: B
